mapper.select: select t.custNo, cu.custName from ( SELECT DISTINCT m.custNo FROM mySchedule m JOIN class c ON m.classNo = c.classNo LEFT JOIN coupon cp ON m.custNo = cp.custNo WHERE m.sheduleCanceled = '0' AND m.scheduleCompleted = '1' AND (EXTRACT(DAY FROM c.classDate) = 22 OR EXTRACT(DAY FROM c.classDate) = 25 OR EXTRACT(DAY FROM c.classDate) = 10) AND (cp.sendDate IS NULL)) t LEFT JOIN cust cu on t.custNo = cu.custNo

UPDATE coupon SET sendDate = SYSDATE, custNo = #{custNo}, couponExdate = ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 2) WHERE couponNo = ( SELECT couponNo FROM ( SELECT couponNo FROM coupon WHERE sendDate IS NULL ORDER BY couponNo ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
